snippet: The Navy Department has not been informed of the sailing of the Mississippi, with her distinguished Hungarian passenger, although there exists here no doubt as to the fact. The necessary orders have been given to the several ships and garrisons to...
lead_paragraph: The Navy Department has not been informed of the sailing of the Mississippi, with her distinguished Hungarian passenger, although there exists here no doubt as to the fact. The necessary orders have been given to the several ships and garrisons to salute Kossuth on his landing.

headline.main: Interesting from the Capital--Honors to Kossuth --Invasion of Mexico, &c.

abstract: Letter to his uncle J.J Crittenden
